headline: Palo Alto Networks (PANW) Valuation Check After Recent Share Price Weakness
summary: Recent share performance and business profile Palo Alto Networks (PANW) has been under pressure recently, with the stock showing declines over the past week, month and past 3 months, drawing investor attention to how this cybersecurity business is currently priced. The company reports annual revenue of about US$9.9b and net income of roughly US$1.3b, reflecting a large, global footprint across network security, cloud security and security operations for enterprises and governments. See our...
